posts.title: Finalize Q2 Financial Report
posts.content: Double-check totals, confirm revenue sources, and export final PDF.

posts.title: Publish weekly blog post
posts.content: Write and upload the article about microservices best practices.

posts.title: Audit staging environments
posts.content: Ensure all test credentials are removed and logs are rotating correctly.
